item.title: HOW TO: Create Single Node Consul Server Cluster
item.description: Overview How to create a Consul single-node dev/test cluster! Install the consul binary Ubuntu/Debian - Latest Version wget -O- https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com/gpg | gpg --dearmor | sudo tee /usr/share/keyrings/hashicorp-archive-keyring.gpg echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/hashicorp-archive-keyring.gpg] https://apt.
